citations.narrative:
The enclosure housing two adult tigers contains a wooden pavilion. The pavilion is leaning to one side and the wooden
floor of the pavilion has several broken boards. These boards have sharp and jagged edges that twist upward.
Sharp edges and damaged platforms can cause injury or harm to the animals.
Outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from
injury and to contain the animals. To be corrected by 8/17/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The enclosure housing two adult tigers contains a wooden pavilion. The pavilion is leaning to one side and the wooden 
floor of the pavilion has several broken boards. These boards have sharp and jagged edges that twist upward. 
 
Sharp edges and damaged platforms can cause injury or harm to the animals. 
 
Outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from 
injury and to contain the animals. To be corrected by 8/17/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
